    Contact Us

    Contact Vizient Support Centre

    MedAssets Customer Support Center

    Connect with us

    Corporate headquarters

    Report non-compliance

    To report non-compliance with the law and Vizient's corporate policies, contact Vizient's Compliance Officer. For anonymous reporting, call our compliance line at (800) 750-4972

    For general and human resource-related questions, contact (972) 830-0000

    For our affiliated companies, please refer to these contact numbers:

    • Apexus: (888) 340-2787
    • aptitude: (866) 842-8811
    • Provista: (888) 538-4662
    Questions about connecting with the Media team?

    Media enquiries

    Vizient serves thousands of health care organizations across the nation with a broad portfolio of solutions, and a robust network of health care experts driving innovation in our industry. Visit our newsroom to stay connected with Vizient through media coverage of our company and key industry topics.

    vizientsupport@vizientinc.com

    Please send all media and events questions to our public relations team:

    • Angie Boliver (972) 830-7961
    • Donna Ledbetter (972) 830-6321
